top_comments.comment: I hate people like that....EARN WHAT YOU NEED...Cowards!!!!
I mean, do you have random people in your house anyway, wouldn’t you think to secure things in a safe or something?
Common sense says to take your valuables with you prior to your house being fumigated.  I guess some people don’t have it.
Doesn't bring her valuables with her.. blames someone else.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Common sense lady...who leaves 75,000 worth of jewelry out on top of dresser....smh
Who trust any company like that period, that’s a shot in da foot.. DA
Why do they have to tell you to hide your valuables lmao
I mean, do you have random people in your house anyway, wouldn’t you think to secure things in a safe or something?
The tent was   E R E C T E D
Common sense says to take your valuables with you prior to your house being fumigated.  I guess some people don’t have it.
they get out alive then they deserve what they got
I doubt she has a Husband, He would have had COMMON SENSE to Secure Valuables while NOT in the home..
Doesn't bring her valuables with her.. blames someone else.

common sense should tell you to do that yourself.  with your documents,  cash. etc don't depend on other people to think for you. think for yourself
